[Groovy] Class SchedulerOperationsService

java.lang.Object
  SchedulerOperationsService
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
class SchedulerOperationsService

SchedulerOperationsService class is used for operations with scheduler, like - getting information - scheduling process - updating scheduled processes/jobs

Authors:
July Antonicheva
